Body:
"""Test _update_port_group_port_ids."""
port = '{d}:{p}'.format(d=self.data.director_id1, p=self.data.port_id1)
port_key = [{constants.DIRECTOR_ID: self.data.director_id1, constants.
    PORT_ID: port}]
details = {constants.SYMMETRIX_PORT_KEY: port_key}
corrected_details = self.provisioning._update_port_group_port_ids(details)
corrected_port_id = corrected_details[constants.SYMMETRIX_PORT_KEY][0][
    constants.PORT_ID]
self.assertEqual(self.data.port_id1, corrected_port_id)
